Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Yalli malaykay missoowiyyah missowtal xiibite
Kaadu Yalli qamburre foorisiyyah foorissa (wakayah wakayta) Malaykal xiibite
Kaadu Qhuraan kee Dikri akriyiyyah takriye malaykal xiibite
Diggah seehaday sin Yallay taqbudeeni inkittuk qibaadá kaah caglisa iyyaanamal xiibite
Usuk qaranwaa kee baaxóoy, ken nammayih fanal taniimih Rabbi, kaadu usuk ayrô mawqooqii kee ayrô kormaamî Rabbi kinni
Diggah Nanu addunyâ qaran cutuukat bilqisneh
Kaadu ummaan sheetanay Yallih taaqatak yewqek, qaran cutuukat dacrisna
Sheetoona qaran mataafaay, irô qaraanal tan Malaykah yab taabbem madudda, kaadu ummaan kabuk qambisimta
Woo ankactuk xiiriysimaanaah, amurruqe wayta digaalá-lon akeeral
Sheetoona Malaykak sissikuk qawta qangara akke waytek yaabbeenim maduudan, tokkel ura dabiitay ken cararisa ken kataata
Nabiyow toysa ken esser ginóh usun gibdoonu innaa hinnay Nanu ginnem gibdim ginoonak? Diggah nanu xankab itta kallay gabat kaftak ken ginne (ken abba Aadam kinnuk)
Wonna hinnay nabiyow koo dirabboysaanaah, qhiyaamah ayróh ugut yangaddeenim qajjibsittah usun kol anqaasak
Hawweeneenim ken kassiisan waqdi kas elle mageyaanaay, edde mayantifiqan
Kaadu atu Nabii kinnitom tascasse astá yablen waqdi teetil anqasaanaah qajjibsitan
Kaadu atu luk temeetem kalah tu- hinna, baxxaqqa iyya baab akke waytek kaak iyyen
Rabneeh burtaay lafoofi nakke waqdi, nanu diggah nuwwuk ugtennoo ninni magooqak? (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
Kaadu nek naharsi abbobtiy warrayte ugtelee iyyen
Yeey, ugtetton keenik ixxic nabiyow; isin xixxibaaneey, qunxaane-luk
Cagalah is Israafiil baantah inki xongoló, eddeluk usun magooqak ugtaanaah sinnik abaanam qambaalitan
Nee gee finqaaw! ah cisaabaay galtóh ayró iyyan (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
Ah-meklah ayróy ginô fan qadlil edde meklaanay isin dirabboysak sugteeni keenik iyyan
Malaykak iyyaanah; koroosite maraa kee koroosannul ken kataateeh ken ceela maraay, usun Yallak kalah aqbaduk sugeenim gaaboysa
Eddeluk jaciim deqsitta giráh gita keenih escessa
Kaadu siraat garil ken eyseeda, diggah usun addunyal abeenimik esserimaanahak
Maca litoonuuh, itta kah cate waytaanam addunyal itta kah catak sugten innah keenik iyyan ken sahitak
Wonna hinnay usun asaaku (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) Yallih amrih gabá yeceenih xixxibaane luk
Korosuk mariiy marat afkanuk keemaaritak itta esseran
Diggah isin cakki-le kabuk nee gutuqak net amaatuk sugteeniih, baatil net bilqisak sugten iyyen kattaate mari katayen marak
Katayen mari keenil gacisak, wonna hinnay isin nummayse marah ma-suginniton keenik iyyan
Kaadu nanu sin amol qandey iimaanak sin edde waasna luk masuginnino, wonna hinnay isin dambit caddok tature marah sugten
Tokkel ni-Rabbih maxcó inkih nel nummatteh, diggah nee kee sin digaalá tammoysenno
Eddeluk Yallih gitaa kee iimaanak sin makkosneh, diggah nanu siinik dumaak makkoote marah sugne
Toysa diggah usun woo ayró (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) digaalál yangaleenih addunyal umaanél yengeleenimih sabbatah. (kattaate maraa kee katayen mara kinnuk)
Diggah nanu umeyniitik tamannah abna
Diggah usun (koros kinnuk) inki Yallak-sa cakkil yaqbuden Yalli mayan ixxica keenik iyyan waqdi, kaxxa-mariinitak sugen addunyal
Kaadu nanu diggah ninni yallitteh qibaadá gad-abê cabulih sabbatah cabnoo iyyen? (woh kak iyyaanam Yallih farmoyta kinnuk)
Wonna hinnay Nabii cakki baaheeh (Qhuraan kee Yalla inkittoysaanam kinnuk) farmoytit nummaysak yemeete
A-korosey isin diggah qansarissa digaalá tammoysetton qhiyaamah ayró
Kaadu addunyal umaanék abak sugteenimik-sa elle galtimtaanam manton akeeral
Yallih naqoosay qibaadá kaah caglissey Yalli isi racmat caglise akke waytek qansarissa digaalák naggowtam matan
Woo meqe maray Yalli doore yimixxige quusiy (rizqhiy) aggiriqqewaa lon
Woo rizqhi maggo caxâ mixu, usun Yalli keenih abe konnabá luk
Waara niqmat-le Jannootah addal yanin
Qaraakiy amol sitta fan afkanuk
Maqiin deqsitta daráh gocoyuk kibuk yan kaaqon keenit meksima
Ama gocoy qadoh, yaaqube marah satta-le
Usuk kas mabeyaay, amô berra mali kaadu usun kaat mayaskiran (madoomitan)
Kaadu ken xaqul saytun agabuy sinni baqoltik-sá num fanah waktewaay, qax-meqe intiita-le lon
Ama agbih weeló dansinte naalay gabá xage wayteh inna-le qidih
Tokkel jannatti mari, mariiy marat keenik yafkune addunyal keenil taturtem itta esserak
Jannatti marak yaabe num iyyeh; diggah anu rabak lakal tan manó yangadde kataysa luk suge addunyal
Diggah atu nummaysa marâ tanitoo? yok axcuk suge
Rabneeh, burtaay, lafoofi nakke waqdi, diggah nanu ugutnaah, cisab nek abaanaah, ninni taamoomil galtimennoo? yok axcuk suge
Woo moominti Jannatal isi kataysiisik, isin girát yoo lih maay boosittan woo korostih caalat nabaluh? Iyya
Eddeluk bossu iyyeeh, jaciim deqsitta girák gudel (guddaqtal) kaa yuble
Yallal xiibita immay, diggah yoo finqise raarte koo oggolinniyoy, kaak (kay kataysay addunyal rabak lakal manó tanim angadduk suge kinnuk) iyya woo moominti
Kaadu yi-Rabbi isi muxxóh tirri yoo heewannay, kôo luk girál xayyoysimeeh tet cule marih num akkuk-en
Nanu waaraah rabewaa mara hinninom hinnaa
Marabna nek naharsi rabay addunyal abne akke waytek, kaadu nanu diggalsimewaa mara hinnino innaa Jannat culleek lakal
Diggah nanu niqmatak edde nanim, usuk kaxxa affaafa
Annah yan niqmatay dudda- leh taamita mari toysa taamitay addunyal
Woo weeló kak taturte jannatih niqmatannaa, qibnaytiinoh taysem, hinnay zaqhqhuum deqsitta caxay cooxuk gactah taniy jahannam addal tani tayseeh
Diggah nanu korosuh aqayyaareh (mokkoroh) tet abne (zaqhqhuum kinnuk)
Diggah is jaciim deqsitta girák ragidik tawqe caxa
Tet mexexi diggah usuk sheetoonâ moyyaayih inna-le qaxumaaneh
Eddeluk diggah usun teetik yakmeeniih, bagitte teetik kiban
Tohuk lakal diggah tet bagul niqna kak caddok taturte leeh daragu-lon maaqabah
Too digaaláh lakal diggah gacsimeyna keenik jaciim deqsitta girâ fanah takke
Diggah usun sinni abbobti makkoote marah geen
Usun wohul ken katayyuh yasissiken
Kaadu Nummah nabiyow ku- marak duma naharsi marak maggo mari makkoote
Kaadu nummah Yallih digaalák ken meesissa farmoytit keenih rubne addunyal
Tokkel meesiisen marih ellecabo kah tekke inna wagitey (cubbusey) nabiyow
Yallih naqoosay Yalli isi racmatat caglisey naggoyse akke waytek, qibaadá kaah cagliseenimih sabbatah
Yalli xiibitak iyyeh; Nabii Nuuc neh seeceh kay maral qokol kaah nakkem keh, tokkel nanu kaa oggola marak yayse mara kinnino
Kaadu kaa kee kay buxah maraay, moominiiniy kaâ luk teemene kaxxa gibdak naggosneh (leet xuunumaanamak, sutaanamak)
Kaadu kay samad raaqe mara ken abne, kay mari leet bayeek gamadal
Kaadu meqe xagar-xagoo kee fayla kay amol cabne ellecabô maray kaak lakal yamaatuwaah arrabat
Sinam addal Nabii Nuucuh saayaay nagaynan cabne
Diggah nanu meqe mara tonnal galatna
Diggah Nabii Nuuc ni-naqoosay teemeney Yallah qibaadá caglissek numuk teyna
Tohuk lakal aki maray kaa dirabboyse leet xuumusneeh (sutusne) finqisne
Kaadu diggah kay (Nabii Nuuc kinnuk) gital kaa kataate marat Nabii Ibraahim yan
Isi Rabbil saytun sorkocô baxa luk yemeete waqdi Yallat agleyta haamak
Isi abbaa kee isi marak Yallak kalah maca taqbudeniih iyye waqdi ken assacakkuk
Yallak kalah gersi yallitte diraabah taqbudenim faxxaanaa
Tohul ginô Rabbi maca siinik abelem takkaleeniih, Yallak kalihim tuqbudeenik
Tokkel ken qiidih keenil luk yawqeemik malkitih cutuukâ fanah wagittoh wagga hee
Edde luk diggah anu biyaakitah keenik iyye
Edde luk derre kaat cabba heenih gexen
Eddeluk ken yallitte fan sissikuk kelli iyyeeh (malgiyeh) matakmaanaa? iyye keenil anqasak
Maca liton kah yaabe waytaanaah essero yol kah gacse waytaanam keenik iyye Nabii Ibraahim
Edde luk Nabii Ibraahim keenit yufkuneh migdi gabah godmat ken aagaruk
Tokkel sissikuk naqabu luk kay mari kaah fan yufkuneeh nanu tet naqbudeeh, atu tet taggilee kaak iyyen
Isin sinni gabah urtaanam taqbudeenii, sin gine Rabbî qibaadá cabba hayteenih keenik iyye
Yalli sin kee isin abba haytaanam gineh anuk
Nabii Ibraahim Yaabah keenik yeyse waqdi, tokkel kay mari uma malah kaah malseeh xiso kaah xisaay jaciim deqsitta girát kaa gasiya (qambisa) iyyen
Kay mari uma malah kaah malseeh, guba raaqa mara ken abneeh, Nabii Ibraahim girák amaanah yewqe
Kaadu Nabii Ibraahim iyyeh; diggah anu guuroh inni Rabbî fan gexaah usuk tirri yoo heele (yoo ascassele)
Nabii Ibraahim Yi-Rabbow meqe marih loowot yan baxa yoh acuw iyye
Eddeluk dooqá kaak oggolleeh kaxxa xiq-le baxal kaa aytikumusne (berrakisne)

Ismaaqil yembeeh barak abballuk taamáh edde gexa caddo yoofe waqdi, yi-baxaw diggah anu soonol koo asguudem ublek, a-caagid wagitey maca kot ceela? Kaak iyye. Yi-babbaw elle amrisimtem ab, wohul Yalli faxek yisbire marih numuh yoo geettok kaak iyye
Edde luk Yallih amri oggolen waqdi (Nabii Ibraahim kee baxa kinnuk) abba seltah (xabanah) kaa oobise kaa yasgaaduh
Kaadu kaa secneh kee Ibraahimow axcuk
Nummah tuble soonó nummasseh, diggah nanu tonnal galatna meqe mara iyye Yalli
Diggah ta-amri (ku baxih masgaada kinnuk) is-baxxaqqa itta aqayyaare kinni
Kaadu nanu kaxxa maruwih (marugih) masgaadal kaa wadne (Ismaaqil kinnuk)
Kaadu Nabii Ibraahimih meqe xagar-xagoo kee fayla kay amol cabne elle cabô maray kaak lakal yamaatuwaah arraabat
Yallih xaquk nagaynan Nabii Ibraahimil yanay
Nabii Ibraahim kah galatne innah meqe mara tonnal galatna
Diggah Nabii Ibraahim ni- naqoosay teemenek numuk teyna
Kaadu Nabii Ibraahim Iscaaqh deqsita baxay Nabii yakkuwaay meqe marak numuk teynah yanil kaa ayti-kumusne (berrakisne)
Kaadu kaa (Ibraahim) kee Iscaaqhal barkat oobisne, kaadu ken nammayih samadak isi nafsih meqe num keenik yaniih, baxxaqqa-le dulmih koroosannut isi nafsi yadlume num keenit yanih
Yalli nummah xiibitak iyyeh; Nabii Muusaa kee Nabii Haaruun nabuwwannut gunneh
Kaadu ken nammay kee ken mara naggosneh kaxxa gibdak (xuumiyya kinnuk)
Kaadu ken qokolleeh, usun firqawnaa kee firqawni marak yayse mara yekken
Kaadu tawraat kitaabay baxxaqqa iyya ken nammayah necee
Kaadu ken nammay massa-le gital (Islaam diini kinnuk) tirri hayne
Kaadu meqe xagar-xagoo kee fayla ken nammayih amol cabne ellecabô maray keenik lakal yamaatuwaah arrabat
Yallih xaquk nagaynan Nabii Muusaa kee Nabii Haaruunul yanay
Diggah ken nammay kah galatne innah nanu meqe mara tonnal galatna
Diggah ken nammay Ni-naqoosay teemenek nammayak teyna
Kaadu diggah Nabii Ilyaas rubsumte farmoytiitik numuk teyna
Isi marak israa-iil xaylok Yallak ma-meesittaanaa? iyye waqdi keenih cus nabiyow
Numtin-welluy baqla deqsita taqbudeeniih, ginó-abák yayse gineynih qibaadá cabtaanaa
Yalli sin Rabbiy sin gineey, siinik naharsi abbobti gine Rabbi kinni
Eddeluk kay mari kaa dirabboyseeh, diggah usun gaaboysime loonuuh xayyowsime-lon girâ digaaláh
Yallih naqoosay Yalli isi racmat caglisey naggoyse akke waytek qibaadá kaah cagliseenimih sabbatah
Kaadu Nabii Ilyaas meqe xagar- xagoo kee fayla kay amol cabne ellecabô maray kaak lakal yamaatuwaah arrabat
Yallih xaquk nagaynan Nabii ĮIlyaasal yanay
Diggah Nabii Ilyaas kah galatne innah Nanu meqe mara tonnal galatna
Diggah Nabii Ilyaas ni-naqoosay teemenek numuk teyna
Kaadu diggah Nabii Luut rubsumte farmoytiitik numuk teyna
Nabiyow keenih cus; Nabii Luut kee kaal yeemene mara inkih digaalák naggosne waqdi
Idaltô daaqaynay (Nabii Luut barra kinnuk) digaalát raaqe maray finqitê luk raqte akke waytek koroositteemih sabbatah
Lakat Nabii Luut marak aka maray raqqayey kaa dirabboyse bayisneh
Kaadu diggah isin Makki maraw ken abuural taturak maacissan
Kaadu bar elle taturtaanahak kas elle mageytaanaa? Ken geytem sin geytaamak
Kaadu diggah Nabii Yuunus rubsumte farmoytiitik numuk teyna
Nabiyow keenih cus ; Nabii Yuunus isi marih naqabuh sinaamak kibuk tan doynik fan kude waqdi
Kaxxa haffó woo doynik marteeh tokkel meesiten waqdi doynik mari saami caxxa qideeh, Nabii Yuunus saami-caxxal kak yeysen marih num yekke
Badat kaa qideeniih, eddeluk kullunti kaa yunxuqe, usuk assacokka lem baahe numuh anuk
Diggah usuk Yalla maggom cusa marih numuh suge wannay
Kullinti bagut edde ugtan ayrô fan sugak yen (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
Eddeluk kullinti baguk baddi afal deebol kaa qambisne usuk lakmisak
Yaqhtiin deqsita cooxuk caxá (xalâ caxá kinnuk) kay amol nuysubuke
Kaadu kay marak bool alfi yakke marah kaa rubne, hinnay wohuk fulaanah
Eddeluk kaa nummayseeniih, edde raban wakti keenik yamaatem fanah ken hatkisneh
Eddeluk nabiyow ken esser; ku- Rabbi say-xaylo leeh, usun lab- xaylo loonuu
Hinnak Malayka sayyoh ginnee usun abaluk
Oobbiyooy! diggah usun sinni diraabah iyyaanah
Yalli xaleh iyyan, diggah usun dirableelá kinnuk
Yalli say-xayló dooritee lab- xaylok
Kee a-maraw maca liton! Mannal mekeltan Yallah say-xayló teexegeeniih, sinnih lab-xaylo teexegen waqdi
Makassittaanaa! Yalli barráa kee xaylo aallewaah, kak saytunnoowem
Hinnak baxxaqqa iyya sumaq litoonuu a-ittaanamal
Toysa sin kitaabay Yallih xaquk litoonu baahay, a-ittaanamal numma yacee mara tekkeenik keenik iyyan
Koros Yallaa kee Malaykâ fanal ramaddiinuu kee lagó heen, nummah malayká teexegeh diggah usun (koros kinnuk) girá digaalál gaaboysime loonuuh xayyoysime loonum qhiyaamah ayró
Yalli saytunnooweh kaa ceele waytaamay koros kaa edde weelossak
Yallih naqoosay Yalli isi racmatat caglisey kaa ceele wayta weelot kaa weeloyse wayta akke waytek
Toysa diggah korosey sin kee isin yallitte axcuk uqbuddu haytaanam
Isin Yallih giták num makot beya mara hinniton
Koroosannuh Jaciim deqsitta girá cula numuy Yalli tet culim elle mekle akke waytek
Malayka itteh; nek inki malaykatti mayan, qaraanal yimixxige arac-le kaa akke waytek
Kaadu diggah nanu Yallih qibaadáh saffih sollá
Kaadu diggah nanu Yalla ceele waytaamak Yalla saytunnosna
Diggah nabiyow atu rubsumtak naharat Makki koros axcuk sugte
“Kitoobaa kee anbiyak naharsi maral temeetem nel amaatinnay diggah oggolak nen
Yallih naqoosay Yalli isi racmatat caglise akkuk-nen”
Makki koros Qhuraan keenil yemeete waqdi kaal koroositeeniih, akeeral digaalák loonum sarrah aaxige-lon
Nummah Ni-qangará Ni-naqoosa farmoytiitih taturteh
Diggah usun sinni naqboytiitil qoklima mara kinnon
Kaadu diggah Ni-qande maysó lem addunyaay akeeral
Toysa nabiyow derre keenit (Makki koros kinnuk) cab dago waktî fanah
Kaadu ken qambal nabiyow digaalák keenil obtuwaytam sarrah ableloonuk
Tokkel edde qataatakaanam Ni- digaalá innaa nabiyow
Tokkel Ni-digaalá ken dabooqal (maaftal) keenil obta waqdi, toysa meesiisen marih maaci maxxu yoomeeh
Kaadu nabiyow derre keenit cab yimixxige waktî fanah
Kaadu nabiyow ken qambal Ni-digaalák keenil obtuwaytam sarrah ableloonuk
Nabiyow ku-Rabbi saytunnooweh maysó-le Rabbi, kaa ceele waytaamay kaa edde weelossu haanak
Kaadu Yallak nagaynan farmoytiitil yanay
Kaadu faylá Yalli-le, ginô Rabbi
